page.title: 06Newborough Shop/Post Office
page.content: { The day begins}at 6am with deliveries of bread and newspapers. The 2 post ladies arrive at 6.45am to sort the post, brought in from{Burton,}which they deliver by bicycle - or sometimes even on foot in heavy snow! The{Shop}opens at 8am selling a wide variety of goods from greengrocery, grocery & hardware to cigarettes and off-licence goods and closes at 6pm. It also accepts dry-cleaning which is collected once a week. The{Post Office}opens at 9am to transact business in stamps, Giro Bank, pensions, allowances etc. The last mail is collected at 5pm. For village{interest}and{information} advertisements are accepted in the shop and posters displayed in the windows. A public{telephone kiosk}is opposite the shop on the village square.
